root.name: 1979: The Game
root.description: Developer of "1979" Navid Khonsari has said in several interviews that throughout the game, the player will switch between many different roles. Such examples mentioned include an American-born Iranian translator on a mission to rescue the embassy hostages, a theocratic militant citizen, and a student demonstrator opposing Shah Mohammad Reza Pahlavi, who was overthrown during the revolution.
